verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
G
I cry out for Your hand
Of mercy to heal me
I am weak
I need Your love to free me
Oh Lord my Rock
My strength in weakness
Come rescue me oh Lord

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
You are my hope
Your promise never fails me
And my desire
Is to follow You forever

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
For You are good
For You are good
For You are good to me
For You are good
For You are good
For You are good to me
